name: Pathway
description: Adventure into the strange unknown with Pathway, a strategy RPG set in the 1930s great desert wilderness. Outwit your enemies in daring turn-based combat, raid occult tombs and make tough choices in a procedurally generated grand pulp expedition!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 64-bit Processor: 2.0 Ghz DualCore CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 or better, OpenGL 3.3 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 64-bit Processor: 2.0+ Ghz QuadCore CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7000 Series, OpenGL 3.3 Storage: 2 GB available space
